WorkItem.Description:
When placing the calendar control inside of an ItemsControl  inside the DataTemplate it is impossible to set the DisplayDate from markup.
Â 
I have included a simple project that illustrates this, all calendars are set in the xaml markup to display Feburary 2009.  However only the calendar that is outside of the ItemsControl works.  The other calendars display the current date no matter what you set their DisplayDate to.
